name: Mow The Lawn
description:
A downloadable game for Windows.

Mow The Lawn is an arcade side scroller with authentic pixel art graphics, inspired by the era of Super Nintendo and Amiga.

Hideous feral grass is threatening the life of innocent villagers! Take your lawn mower robot and cut the levels clean! You only need one button to play, but it's not going to be easy: levels are filled with insane life threatening obstacles!
